venue_description: The Hampton Classic Horse Show is one of the largest outdoor horse shows in the United States and a premier destination for equestrians. Top riders from around the world compete for more than $1 million in prize money with approximately 1,400 horses entered in over 200 competitions, and spectators enjoy shopping, dining and special activities like adoption day for animalshttps://www.hamptonclassic.com/general-information/#:~:text=who%20we%20are.

prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Hampton Classic Horse Show (venue_uid=hcsh-venue)","Location":"city: Bridgehampton city_uid=bridgehampton, state:NY state_uid=ny.","GEO context":"lat=40.937646, lon=-72.3200174 placeid=EjUyNDAgU25ha2UgSG9sbG93IFJkICMyYywgQnJpZGdlaGFtcHRvbiwgTlkgMTE5MzIsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJBZ5_6Ae-6IkR3F8KEYnqbxESAjJj.","Official venue link":"https://www.hamptonclassic.com/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.hamptonclassic.com/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "hcsh-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Hampton Classic Horse Show — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "Bridgehampton’s Hampton Classic is a polished, big-ring, end-of-summer showcase with grass show rings and dialed operations. Expect a busy warm-up ring before every major eq and hunter block, a clearly marked jog strip, and a boutique vendor row that can rescue any last-minute tack or turnout hiccup. Stabling is tented with efficient aisles and close access to schooling; plan your hack to the Grand Prix Field with a few extra minutes for traffic and spectator flow. Keep weather in mind—morning dew on the grass rides differently than a sun-baked afternoon—so time your schools around drags and waterings to step in feeling sharp.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Hampton Classic",
    "Bridgehampton NY",
    "Grand Prix Field",
    "grass footing",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "derbies",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your Hampton Classic week",
  "section_img": "https://www.hamptonclassic.com/wp-content/uploads/hampton-classic-main-ring.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "Hampton Classic Grand Prix Field with riders schooling and spectators along the VIP tents",
  "section_link": "https://www.hamptonclassic.com/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for the Hampton Classic in Bridgehampton—warm-up ring flow, jog strip details, vendor row, stabling tips, and grass-ring timing for A-circuit riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "Hampton Classic — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Practical notes on warm-up traffic, the jog strip, vendor row, tent stabling, and grass footing so you can move efficiently all week in Bridgehampton.",
  "section_search_title": "Hampton Classic Horse Show Venue Profile",
  "section_search_description": "Authoritative rider-focused overview of the Hampton Classic: warm-up, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, grass footing, and show-day logistics in Bridgehampton, NY.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for the Hampton Classic",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up: peak congestion before junior eq and pro hunter trips—flat early, call in with the ingate, and hold your spot.",
      "Grass rings: morning dew vs. afternoon firm—pack stud options and adjust your school to match the feel underfoot.",
      "Grand Prix Field access: add 5–10 minutes from stabling for spectator/foot traffic near VIP and sponsor rows.",
      "Jog strip: arrive ring-ready—number visible, towel for quick wipe-downs, hoof oil, and a spare rag in your pocket.",
      "Vendor row: the Boutique Garden has fast fixes—stirrups, gloves, spur straps, stud kits, and on-the-spot repairs.",
      "Stabling: tent aisles are busy—keep trunks flush, fans secured, and hose lines tidy to maintain flow before drags.",
      "Course walks: windows are tight—carry a ring bag (hole punch, zip ties, electrical tape) to avoid barn back-and-forth.",
      "Footing/drags: posted on the board—time your last fences to land right after a drag or water for best takeoff.",
      "Parking & drop-offs: morning queue builds quickly—schedule hay/grain deliveries and farrier slots outside peak class times.",
      "Pro tip: text the barn when you’re 10-out so your horse hits the jog strip polished and relaxed."
    ]
  }
}

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Hampton Classic Horse Show","state_uid":["rechRMPXjOPMcuXJj"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hamptonclassic.com/","city_uid":["rec56Qvi3q4euTzU3"],"placeId":"EjUyNDAgU25ha2UgSG9sbG93IFJkICMyYywgQnJpZGdlaGFtcHRvbiwgTlkgMTE5MzIsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJBZ5_6Ae-6IkR3F8KEYnqbxESAjJj","formatted_addressv3":"240 Snake Hollow Rd, Bridgehampton, NY 11932","venue_recordId":"recTTaOHE3IIE8NOO"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Hampton Classic Horse Show","state_uid":["rechRMPXjOPMcuXJj"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hamptonclassic.com/","city_uid":["rec56Qvi3q4euTzU3"],"placeId":"EjUyNDAgU25ha2UgSG9sbG93IFJkICMyYywgQnJpZGdlaGFtcHRvbiwgTlkgMTE5MzIsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJBZ5_6Ae-6IkR3F8KEYnqbxESAjJj","formatted_addressv3":"240 Snake Hollow Rd, Bridgehampton, NY 11932","venue_recordId":"recTTaOHE3IIE8NOO"}]), Hampton Classic Horse Show represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 240 Snake Hollow Rd, Bridgehampton, NY 11932, GEO context: lat=40.937646, lon=-72.3200174 placeid=EjUyNDAgU25ha2UgSG9sbG93IFJkICMyYywgQnJpZGdlaGFtcHRvbiwgTlkgMTE5MzIsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJBZ5_6Ae-6IkR3F8KEYnqbxESAjJj., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Eastern Time (ET), New York-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Hampton Classic Horse Show in Bridgehampton, NY is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
venue_descriptionv2: The Hampton Classic Horse Show is one of the largest outdoor horse shows in the United States and a premier destination for equestrians. Top riders from around the world compete for more than $1 million in prize money with approximately 1,400 horses entered in over 200 competitions, and spectators enjoy shopping, dining and special activities like adoption day for animalshttps://www.hamptonclassic.com/general-information/#:~:text=who%20we%20are.
